1993 Formation of poliovirus-like particles by recombinant baculoviruses expressing the individual VP0, VP3, and VP1 proteins by comparison to particles derived from the expressed poliovirus polyprotein. Virology 192: 512– 524. doi: 10.1006/viro.1993.1067. 8380663
